Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells were stably transfected with DMT1 and/or mutant SNCA.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased Fe2+ uptake and cell death
Readout description.Result Description: DMT1 overexpression increased Fe2+ uptake, leading to enhanced cell death and oxidative stress. Mutant SNCA exacerbated these effects. Autophagy inhibition reversed cell death.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Fe2+ uptake within physiological range; cell viability >80%.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Fe2+ uptake significantly elevated (>2-fold); cell viability <50%.
